text: Kelsey Regina Byrne (born May 6, 1990), known professionally as Vérité (stylized as VÉRITÉ), is an American singer-songwriter and musician. Her first single "Strange Enough" was self-released in July 2014. Her music genre is indie pop, electropop and alternative pop. Her second EP, Sentiment, was self- released on June 8, 2015. ==Early life== Kelsey Regina Byrne was born on May 6, 1990, in Orange County, New York. Her father was a rock musician. Vérité began to sing while still in elementary school. She learned piano when young. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Vérité on Neon Gold Records Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:American pop musicians Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state)
title: Vérité
